name: Don't ! Heroes: Encore!
description:
Disclaimer : While playing the HTML version of the game, you might encounter some minor audio issues. To get the full experience, please download the windows executable below.

Don't ! Heroes : Encore!

The world needs your help ! After a slumber of a thousand years, the Source of Evil is back, along with hordes of monsters.  Only a few chosen heroes might be able to defeat them... 
As the spirit of wisdom, you can help the heroes in their quest, but the only way you can interact with them is by saying "No" ! 

Prevent the heroes bad actions to defeat your opponents. Don't refuse their choices too often, or they will get out of your control !

Will you manage to defeat the Source of Evil and restore peace ?

Controls :

Any key : Act
Hold any key : Skip cutscene
↓ / ↑ : Change volume

Features :

Don't ! Heroes : Encore! is the post-jam version of Don't ! Heroes, made during the 2020 GMTK game jam.

This new version includes :

- New cutscenes and story
- Hardmode (after beating the game once)
- 2 new characters (including a secret character during hardmode)
- Dozens of new attacks and spells
- Lots of new monsters
- Tons of balance changes
